alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 12:47PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL TARGET JEFFERSON AND NORTHERN PORTIONS OF OSWEGO AND LEWIS COUNTIES THROUGH 3 PM... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH will produce whiteout conditions which will reduce visibility to below a quarter mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 2 to 3 inches per hour. Travel will be extremely difficult to impossible in this snow band. There are also areas of blowing snow in and outside of this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1240 PM EST, the band of lake effect snow was across the southern two-thirds of Jefferson County and far northern Lewis County. The heavy snow band will remain nearly stationary through mid-afternoon, then it will begin to shift slightly southward late this afternoon. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Fort Drum, Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Adams, Dexter, Glen Park, Herrings, Adams Center, Southwick Beach State Park, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, Denmark, New Bremen, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Black River and Smithville. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 48. SAFETY INFO... Do not travel in this band of heavy snow. The combination of heavy snow and drifting snow will make many roads impassible. &&
